definition: toward or in the lower or central part of town, of or located in the lower part of a town, or in the business center, the central area or commercial center of a town or city
details:
adverb
- toward or in the lower or central part of town
adjective
- of or located in the lower part of a town, or in the business center
= example: of or located in the lower part of a town, or in the business center
noun
- the central area or commercial center of a town or city
= example: the central area or commercial center of a town or city
= synonyms: business district
